songs.title: Cha Ching (Till We Grow Older)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
(Hey!) I don't sleep so well at night
Waking up and shivering
Heater's gone and money's tight
In this little home that I'm living in

[Refrain]
You've gotta live your life
While your blood is boiling
Those doors won't open
While you stand and watch them

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh-oh oh-oh oh
What is with you?
Oh-oh oh-oh oh
I've never seen this side of you

Oh-oh oh-oh oh
What is with you?
Oh-oh oh-oh oh
I've never seen this side of you (Hey!)

[Chorus]
We are all living, till we grow older
You be the worker, I'll be the soldier
I never hear those sounds you sing to me
I never hear those sounds you sing to me, cha ching, cha ching, cha ching-a-ling
I never hear those sounds you sing to me, cha ching, cha ching, cha ching-a-ling

[Verse 2]
I don't think it's quite the same
Just running out to feel the rain
Staring as the stars parade
Are they telling me it's gonna be okay?

[Refrain]
You've gotta live your life
While your blood is boiling
Those doors won't open
While you stand and watch them

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh-oh oh-oh oh
What is with you?
Oh-oh oh-oh oh
I've never seen this side of you (Hey!)

Oh-oh oh-oh oh
What is with you?
Oh-oh oh-oh oh
I've never seen this side of you (Hey!)

[Chorus]
We are all living, till we grow older
You be the worker, I'll be the soldier
I never hear those sounds you sing to me, cha ching, cha ching, cha ching-a-ling
I never hear those sounds you sing to me, cha ching, cha ching, cha ching-a-ling

[Bridge]
Oh, oh oh
Oh-oh, oh oh
Oh, oh oh
Oh-oh, oh oh

Oh, oh oh
Oh-oh, oh oh
Oh, oh oh
Oh-oh, oh oh

Oh, oh oh
Oh-oh, oh oh (Margana on si ereht)
Oh, oh oh
Oh-oh, oh oh (Margana on si ereht)

Oh, oh oh
Oh-oh, oh oh (Margana on si ereht)
Oh, oh oh
Oh-oh, oh oh (Margana on si ereht)

[Chorus]
We are all living, till we grow older
You be the worker, I'll be the soldier
I never hear those sounds you sing to me, cha ching, cha ching, cha ching-a-ling
I never hear those sounds you sing to me, cha ching, cha ching, cha ching-a-ling

[Chorus]
We are all living, till we grow older (Older, till we're older)
You be the worker, I'll be the soldier (Till we're older, till we're older)
I never hear those sounds you sing to me, cha ching, cha ching, cha ching-a-ling (Till we're older, till we're older)
I never hear those sounds you sing to me, cha ching, cha ching, cha ching-a-ling (Till we're older, till we're older)

[Outro]
(Older, till we're older)
(Till we're older, till we're older)
(Till we're older, till we're older)
(Till we're older, till we're older)

(Older, till we're older)
(Till we're older, till we're older)
(Till we're older, till we're older)
(Till we're older, till we're older)
